history: Our company was founded in 2015 to help businesses improve their digital skills. We provide courses and services for companies to optimize their workflow.
current_work: We currently offer training programs in office suite tools, cloud computing, and business management to thousands of clients worldwide.

team.name: Alice Johnson
team.desc: Alice **must** lead the company and make strategic decisions. She **doesn’t have to** work on daily operations, as the managers handle them.

team.name: Mark Smith
team.desc: Mark **has to** ensure that all our online services run smoothly. He **mustn’t** allow security breaches.

team.name: Sarah Lee
team.desc: Sarah **has to** hire the best professionals for our company. She **doesn’t have to** handle payroll, as the finance team takes care of it.
